nodes.id: 中国地震局离退休干部办公室

zh-cn: 中国地震局离退休干部办公室

location.zh-cn: 北京市海淀区复兴路63号
location.en: No. 63 Fuxing Road, Haidian District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局直属的内设职能机构，负责地震系统离退休干部管理工作。
description.en: An internal functional agency directly under the China Earthquake Administration, responsible for the management of retired cadres in the earthquake system.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任中国地震局离退休干部办公室主任，并兼任离退办支部书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the Director of the Retired Cadres Office of the China Earthquake Administration and concurrently as the Secretary of the Retired Cadres Office Party Branch.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任中国地震局离退休干部办公室副主任。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the Deputy Director of the Retired Cadres Office of the China Earthquake Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任中国地震局离退休干部办公室离退支部书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the Secretary of the Retired Cadres Party Branch of the Retired Cadres Office of the China Earthquake Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责管理全国地震工作的机构，前身为国家地震局。
description.en: The agency of the People's Republic of China responsible for managing national earthquake affairs, formerly known as the National Earthquake Administration.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China and its highest state administrative organ.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家科学技术方面最高学术机构。国家地震局组建时，调整了原隶属于该院的地震研究部门。
description.en: The highest academic institution in science and technology in the People's Republic of China. When the National Earthquake Administration was formed, earthquake research departments formerly under this academy were reorganized.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的办事机构，负责处理国务院日常工作。
description.en: The administrative office of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for handling the daily work of the State Council.

relationships.source: 中国地震局离退休干部办公室

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局离退休干部办公室是中国地震局直属的内设职能机构。
description.en: The Retired Cadres Office is an internal functional agency directly under the China Earthquake Administration.

relationships.target: 中国地震局离退休干部办公室
中国共产党中国地震局离退休干部办公室支部委员会

description.zh-cn: 王蕊兼任离退办支部书记。
description.en: Wang Rui concurrently serves as the secretary of the Retired Cadres Office Party Branch.

relationships.target: 中国地震局离退休干部办公室
中国共产党中国地震局离退休干部支部委员会

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1971年8月2日，中华人民共和国国务院决定调整原中国科学院下属的各地震研究部门，组建国家地震局（中国地震局前身）。
description.en: On August 2, 1971, the State Council of the People's Republic of China decided to reorganize the earthquake research departments formerly under the Chinese Academy of Sciences to form the National Earthquake Administration (predecessor of the China Earthquake Administration).

description.zh-cn: 1999年，国务院办公厅印发规定，将国家地震局改组为中国地震局。
description.en: In 1999, the General Office of the State Council issued regulations to reorganize the National Earthquake Administration into the China Earthquake Administration.
